name: insurance-shopping-cart
description: Root package to manage client and server

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix client && npm run test --prefix server
